targets.query:
from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "counter")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "rssi")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "fw_version")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "opcn3_fw_ver")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "opcn3_fw_ver")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sps30_fw_ver")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sps30_fw_ver")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "opcn3_PM1" or r._field == "opcn3_PM2_5" or r._field == "opcn3_PM10")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "opcn3_bin0" or r._field == "opcn3_bin1" or r._field == "opcn3_bin2" or r._field == "opcn3_bin3" or r._field == "opcn3_bin4" or r._field == "opcn3_bin5" or r._field == "opcn3_bin6" or r._field == "opcn3_bin7" or r._field == "opcn3_bin8" or r._field == "opcn3_bin9" or r._field == "opcn3_bin10" or r._field == "opcn3_bin11" or r._field == "opcn3_bin12" or r._field == "opcn3_bin13" or r._field == "opcn3_bin14" or r._field == "opcn3_bin15" or r._field == "opcn3_bin16" or r._field == "opcn3_bin17" or r._field == "opcn3_bin18" or r._field == "opcn3_bin19" or r._field == "opcn3_bin20" or r._field == "opcn3_bin21" or r._field == "opcn3_bin22" or r._field == "opcn3_bin23")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sps30_PM1" or r._field == "sps30_PM2" or r._field == "sps30_PM10" or r._field == "sps30_PM4")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sps30_NumPM0" or r._field == "sps30_NumPM1" or r._field == "sps30_NumPM2" or r._field == "sps30_NumPM4" or r._field == "sps30_NumPM10")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "AD_socket_1_1" or r._field == "AD_socket_1_2")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "AD_socket_2_1" or r._field == "AD_socket_2_2")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "AD_socket_3_1" or r._field == "AD_socket_3_2")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "AD_socket_4_1" or r._field == "AD_socket_4_2")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bme280_t")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bme280_h")

from(bucket: "ppz-data-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor_id == "${sensor_id}")
